title: Katrukkulle  lyrics Sarvam Song lyrics
stanzas:
Kaatrukkulle vasam pola vandhaai enakkul nee
Kattukkle mazayai poley aaga unakkul naan
Maraadhe…. Mannoodu endrume
Mazhai vaasam….. nenjodu unnaipoll
Theeradeeey…. Kannodu enndrume
Uyireeram … epodhum ennai pol.. ennai pol

Nadu kaatril thanimai vandadey,
azhagiya aasai unarvu thandade
Ulagam maruthey .. uyir sugam thedudhey 
Ila peyil thodamal pookal
mottaga engum thengaddi nee
Pudhu vergal kai seerthu pachai
neer korthu soozhum egandam nee 


Kadal katril idhayam pattadhe,
adhil undan peyarai azhuthi cholludhe
Alai madi needudhey, adhil unnai endhudhe 

Thangaadhee.. thagangal manila
Un moochil... ushnangal thaakudhe

Neekaadhey… niram mattram endrume
Un degham, naadedho pogudey!
